name: ZombieMaze
description:
"Helicopter is on the roof!!!"
You are the brave person who can survive zombie appocalipes.
there are 3 types of the zombie!! run!!

'Zombie maze' is simply hard game with zombie shooting game.
Player have to find the way to go upstair with killing the zombies.
You don't have to kill all the zombies on the floor
but you better kill all the zombies.
Can you make it to the roof?

'Zombie Maze' features 12 floors with zombies.
all different map with tons of zombies.

Disclaimer
JO is not responsible for nightmares or dizziness.

Controls
Move with WASD keys
relaod gun with R key
change weapon with TAB
menu for ESC
and the finally you can kill zombie with MOUSE LEFT click

Requirements
'Zombie Maze' can work on any Windows computer.
